messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: The Mystifying Museum Mystery DATE: 06/06/77 The courtroom was a hub of vigorous questioning as the trial carried on. The prosecution summoned the officers essential to the investigation to elucidate on their findings. LAW ENFORCEMENT TESTIMONY: PROSECUTOR: Please state your name and role in the investigation. WITNESS: I am Lieutenant A. B. Brown, the primary investigator in this case. PROSECUTOR: Thank you, Lieutenant Brown. Can you detail the events on the morning the mystery was discovered? WITNESS: Yes. On the morning of October 10th, Officer C. D. Davis noticed an anomaly at the museum and reported it. The investigation kicked off instantly. PROSECUTOR: Who was in charge of the forensic examination? WITNESS: Sergeant E. F. Edwards and Technician G. H. Harris led the forensic analysis. PROSECUTOR: Who were responsible for the interrogations? WITNESS: Detectives I. J. Johnson and K. L. King conducted the interrogations of suspects and potential witnesses. PROSECUTOR: Thank you. No further questions. The Defense began an extensive cross-examination of Lieutenant Brown regarding the investigative methods. Throughout the trial, Patrol Officer M. N. Nelson, Patrol Officer O. P. Olsen, and Patrol Officer Q. R. Ramirez were also brought to testify.
